name: list_weekly_top_albums
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: Fetches the weekly top albums from Spotify for a given date and region.

date.description: The date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format for which to retrieve the top albums. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

region.description: The region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`) for which to retrieve the top albums. Defaults to `global`.
